Comment.Text: You can browse each box' documentation by selecting the box and pressing F1

Overview This scenario allows to quickly replay an online session recorded file, and watch the corresponding feedback using the handball vr-demo. This scenario is based on motor-imagery-bci-4-replay. It uses VRPN servers to communicate with the handball application. Note: refer to scenario motor-imagery-3-online for details about the processing.
Please note that the feedback is starting near 40'
